sentences.sentence: "A Good New Year," sung by Kenneth McKellar, (Trad., Arr. Knight).
sentences.translation: "新年好"，肯尼斯·麦凯勒演唱 (传统乐曲, 奈特改编）。

sentences.sentence: Our trad agreement with Britain will expire at the end of this year.
sentences.translation: 我们与英国的贸易协定将在今年年底终止。

sentences.sentence: Of course, only a fool would ignore real fears ( dangers ) inherent to trad or highball climbing.
sentences.translation: 当然， 只有蠢人才忽视传统或快速攀登中所蕴含的真正恐惧（ 危险）。
